name: Super Robot Wars Action Figure Taisen OG Cybaster Spirit Possession Ver. 23 cm
description:
Planned and produced by CCSTOYS, right from the popular game series "SUPER ROBOT TAISEN OG", Cybaster, the Masoukishin of the Wind, has now joined the MORTAL MIND series in its "Possession" form! !
While faithfully reproducing the sharp appearance of Cybaster, this product is delivered as an alloy action figure with original design arrangements and a luxurious metallic paint!
This alloy action figure has various gimmicks concealed everywhere in its body: the "Cosmo Variators" in the forearms can open up; the activation scene of the "Astral Synchronizers" in its legs and shoulders can also be reproduced with interlocking gimmicks and effection parts. The LED lights in the abdomen, shoulders, arms and wings are all one-touch types that can be lit up just by pressing. What's more, it can even transform into "Cybird" mode without any replacement parts!
Make sure not to miss this masterpiece by CCSTOYS! !

Parts List:

- Cybaster (Spirit Possession Ver.) figure body
- Discutter
- High Familiar x 2
- "Laplace Demon Mode" shoulder effection parts (L) x 2
- "Laplace Demon Mode" shoulder effection parts (S) x 2 pairs
- "Laplace Demon Mode" leg effection parts x 2
- Optional hand parts x 2 pairs
- Effection for Discutter
- Hexagram effection parts for High Familiar x 2
- Jet flame effection parts for High Familiar x 2
- High Familiar displaying stand x 2
- Hexagram displaying stand (with LED)
- Joint for displaying base x 2
- Supporter for displaying base (long/short)
